00021 using Gtk;
00022 
00023 using System;
00024 using System.IO;
00025 using System.Net;

00027 using Niry;
00028 using Niry.Utils;
00029 using Niry.Network;
00030 using Niry.GUI.Gtk2;
00031 
00032 using NyFolder;
00033 using NyFolder.GUI;
00034 using NyFolder.Utils;
00035 using NyFolder.Protocol;
00036 using NyFolder.GUI.Base;
00037 using NyFolder.PluginLib;
00038 
00039 namespace NyFolder.Plugins.DeviantART {
00041     public class DeviantART : Plugin {
00042         // ============================================
00043         // PUBLIC Const
00044         // ============================================
00045         public const int ThumbWidth = 100;
00046         public const int ThumbHeight = 52;
00047 
00048         // ============================================
00049         // PRIVATE Members
00050         // ============================================
00051         private NotebookViewer notebookViewer = null;
00052         private INyFolder nyFolder = null;
00053 
00054         // ============================================
00055         // PUBLIC Constructors
00056         // ============================================
00058         public DeviantART() {
00059             // Initialize Plugin Info
00060             this.pluginInfo = new Info();
00061 
00062             // Initialize Talk Stock
00063             Gdk.Pixbuf pixbuf;
00064             pixbuf = new Gdk.Pixbuf(null, "DeviantART.png");
00065             StockIcons.AddToStock("DeviantART", pixbuf);
00066             StockIcons.AddToStockImages("DeviantART", pixbuf);
00067         }
00068 
00069         // ============================================
00070         // PUBLIC Methods
00071         // ============================================
00072         public override void Initialize (INyFolder iNyFolder) {
00073             this.nyFolder = iNyFolder;
00074 
00075             // Initialize GUI Events
00076             this.nyFolder.MainWindowStarted += new BlankEventHandler(OnMainWindowStarted);
00077         }
00078 
00079         // ============================================
00080         // PRIVATE (Methods) Event Handlers
00081         // ============================================
00082         private void OnMainWindowStarted (object sender) {
00083             // Initialize GUI Components
00084             InitializeMenu();
00085 
00086             // Initialize Notebook Viewer
00087             notebookViewer = this.nyFolder.MainWindow.NotebookViewer;
00088 
00089             LoadSectionImages("customization/wallpaper/apple/");
00090         }
00091 
00092         // ============================================
00093         // PRIVATE Methods
00094         // ============================================
00095         private void InitializeMenu() {
00096             ActionEntry[] entries = new ActionEntry[] {
00097                 new ActionEntry("DeviantARTMenu", "DeviantArt", "DeviantART", null, null, null),
00098 
00099                 // Menu Actions
00100             };
00101             
00102             string ui = "<ui>" +
00103                         "  <menubar name='MenuBar'>" +
00104                         "    <menu action='ToolMenu'>" +
00105                         "      <menu action='DeviantARTMenu'>" +
00106                         "      </menu>" +
00107                         "    </menu>" +
00108                         "  </menubar>" +
00109                         "</ui>";
00110 
00111             nyFolder.MainWindow.Menu.AddMenus(ui, entries);
00112         }
00113 
00114         private void LoadSectionImages (string section) {
00115             string url = "http://browse.deviantart.com/" + section;
00116             WebProxy proxy = Proxy.GetConfig();
00117             string[] images = UrlExtractor.GetImages(url, proxy);
00118 Gtk.Application.Invoke(delegate {
00119             ImageViewer imageViewer = new ImageViewer();
00120             notebookViewer.AppendCustom(imageViewer, section, 
00121                                         new Gtk.Image("DeviantART", IconSize.Menu));
00122 
00123             foreach (string imgUrl in images) {
00124                 byte[] imgData = UrlUtils.FetchPage(imgUrl, proxy);
00125                 Gdk.Pixbuf pixbuf = new Gdk.Pixbuf(imgData);
00126                 imageViewer.Add(imgUrl, imgUrl, pixbuf);
00127             }
00128 });
00129         }
00130 
00131         private string GenerateRealImagePath (string imagePath) {
00132             return(Paths.UserSharedDirectory(MyInfo.Name) + imagePath);
00133         }
00134 
00135         private void LoadImage (UserInfo userInfo, string path) {
00136             try {
00137                 Gdk.Pixbuf pixbuf = ImageUtils.GetPixbuf(path, ThumbWidth, ThumbHeight);
00138                 LoadImage(userInfo, path, pixbuf);
00139             } catch (Exception e) {
00140                 Debug.Log("Load {0} Image {1}: {2}", userInfo.Name, path, e.Message);
00141             }
00142         }
00143 
00144         private void LoadImage (UserInfo userInfo, string path, Gdk.Pixbuf pixbuf) {
00145             // Lookup File Iter
00146             FolderViewer folderViewer = notebookViewer.LookupPage(userInfo);
00147             if (folderViewer == null) return;
00148 
00149             // Get File Tree Iter
00150             Gtk.TreeIter iter = folderViewer.Store.GetIter(path);
00151             if (iter.Equals(Gtk.TreeIter.Zero)) return;
00152 
00153             // Build & Set Thumb Image
00154             Gtk.Application.Invoke(delegate {
00155                 folderViewer.Store.SetPixbuf(iter, pixbuf);
00156                 folderViewer.ShowAll();
00157             });
00158         }
00159 
00160         // ============================================
00161         // PUBLIC Properties
00162         // ============================================
00163     }
00164 }
